General.Name: Libental
General.Description: A. Libental Holdings Ltd engages in land acquisition and planning, issuing permits, construction and supervision, marketing, and sale activities in Israel. It constructs residential and commercial buildings, and infrastructure projects. The company was formerly known as Lumir Holdings Ltd. and changed its name to A. Libental Holdings Ltd in November 2007. A. Libental Holdings Ltd was founded in 1956 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel.
